Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: கற்றீண்டு மெய்ப்பொருள் கண்டார் தலைப்படுவர்மற்றீண்டு வாரா நெறி.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: They, who in this birth have learned to know the True Being, enter the road which returns not into this world.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person is shown in this world ('ஈண்டு'). They have studied and learned ('கற்று') and have finally perceived the True, Real Substance of the universe ('மெய்ப்பொருள் கண்டார்'). This is visualized as a magnificent, radiant, cosmic truth appearing before them.
Layered_Composition.Midground: The moment they perceive this Truth, a new path materializes before them. This is the 'Path of No Return' ('வாரா நெறி'). It is a road made of pure, white light that leads away from the earthly realm.
Layered_Composition.Background: The person is shown stepping onto this path and beginning their final journey ('தலைப்படுவர்'), leaving the dark, cyclical realm of reincarnation behind forever. The path leads to a state of absolute, blissful light.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Those who, in this life, succeed in learning and perceiving the Ultimate Truth will set out upon the path of no return, achieving final liberation from the cycle of rebirth.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The appearance of the Path of No Return at the exact moment of perception is the key. It is not something they search for, but something that appears once they are worthy. The contrast between the dark, repetitive world they are leaving and the bright, linear path to liberation is crucial.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The earthly realm is in muted, shadowy colors. The Ultimate Truth is a source of brilliant, divine light. The Path of No Return is made of this same pure, white light, cutting a definitive road away from the darkness.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot from behind the person, showing the Truth appearing before them, the path materializing, and their first, decisive step onto it.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with spectacular, cosmic effects for the vision of Truth and the Path of No Return.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The light of the perceived Truth is what creates the path forward.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Epic fantasy art, with a strong spiritual theme.

Cultural_Anchors: Those who have learned here and seen the Truth (கற்று ஈண்டு மெய்ப்பொருள் கண்டார்)
Will set out upon the path of no return (மற்றீண்டு வாரா நெறி தலைப்படுவர்)
